tool_description: This is Unofficial CoinDesk Crypto API. Get any cryptocurrency price
name: CoinDesk CryptoCurrency Price
title: CoinDesk CryptoCurrency Price

api_list.name: Crypto Metrics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coindesk-cryptocurrency-price.p.rapidapi.com/crypto-metrics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coindesk-cryptocurrency-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
